screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .imovietrailer file in Apple iMovie 10
screenshot.caption: IMOVIETRAILER file open in Apple iMovie 10

description: The iOS version of iMovie allows you to create various types of video projects and save them as .IMOVIEMOBILE files. However, if you create a trailer, the app saves it as an IMOVIETRAILER file.
To create an IMOVIETRAILER file with the iOS version of iMovie:
IMOVEITRAILER files are compressed with Zip-compression and store various files and folders, including:

images.caption: IMOVIETRAILER file open in Apple iMovie 10

images.alt: Decompressed IMOVIETRAILER file open in Apple Finder
images.caption: Decompressed IMOVIETRAILER file open in Apple Finder
